description.en: Arrange items in the correct order.
description.nl: Zet items in de juiste volgorde.

generation.instructions: Generate settings that look like this: {"options": ["A", "B", "C", "D", "E"], "correctAnswer": ["A", "B", "C", "D", "E"]}, where `options` contains the items that the student should rearrange (can contain simple HTML markup), in the correct order, and `correctAnswer` should be the exact same.

settings.name: Options
settings.description: The items that the student should rearrange, in the correct order. Can contain simple HTML markup.

help.en: Arrange the items in the correct order. They will be shown in a random order to the student.
help.nl: Rangschik de items in de juiste volgorde. Ze worden in een willekeurige volgorde aan de student getoond.
